item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

I’m now adding PM’s to my winterloves server and i get this error

client.java:3627: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable i
location: class client
                if (friends[i] != 0) {
                            ^
client.java:3643: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable i
location: class client
                if (friends[i] != 0) {
                            ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

But when i do anything to fix it, i get an error saying it has already been defined.
Any help?

Here is the code

public boolean isinpm(long l) {
        for (int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) {
            if (friends[i] != 0) {
                if (l == friends[i]) {
                    return true;
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

    public void pmupdate(int pmid, int world) {
        long l = misc.playerNameToInt64(handler.players[pmid].playerName);
        if (handler.players[pmid].Privatechat == 0) {
            for (int i = 0; i < friends.length; i++) {
                if (friends[i] != 0) {
                    if (l == friends[i]) {
                        loadpm(l, world);
                        return;
                    }
                }
            }
        } else if (handler.players[pmid].Privatechat == 1) {
            for (int i1 = 0; i1 < friends.length; i1++) {
                if (friends[i] != 0) {
                    if (l == friends[i1]) {
                        if (handler.players[pmid].isinpm(
                                misc.playerNameToInt64(playerName))
                                        && playerRights > 2) {
                            loadpm(l, world);
                            return;
                        } else {
                            loadpm(l, 0);
                            return;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        } else if (handler.players[pmid].Privatechat == 2) {
            for (int i2 = 0; i2 < friends.length; i2++) {
                if (friends[i] != 0) {
                    if (l == friends[i2] && playerRights < 2) {
                        loadpm(l, 0);
                        return;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

Read full topic
